WHO AM I?

My name is Zakarias, a 31-year-old father of two with a deep-rooted passion for technology. After spending ten years in sales, where I honed my communication and problem-solving skills, I realized that my true interest lay in the tech world. This led me to make a decisive shift toward frontend development, where I can combine creativity with technical expertise.

Now fully immersed in my studies in Borås, I’m focused on mastering the skills necessary to build intuitive, user-friendly web experiences. My goal is to leverage my past experience while driving forward in a field that both challenges and excites me.
